. Why would he want such a compromised spokesman? Was he naive enough to believe Mr Andy Coulson 's assurances? Or did he not care about what had taken place? Neither scenario is very comforting.'' I think that Mr Andy Coulson has much more explaining to do. I am amazed that Dave did not think this too, and that he, in the wake of what I know he was advised by very senior colleagues, persisted in having this deeply compromised man in the heart of No 10. This is catastrophic for Dave, whose arrogance, lack of judgment and contempt for decent values are all exposed at a stroke by Andy Coulson 's scuttling off with his head held low. Marjorie Dannenfelser said. She said Mike Pence , a former radio talk show host, connects with those he's speaking to.`` I hate to bring up Ronald Reagan because everybody does that,'' Marjorie Dannenfelser said. But it's what Ronald Reagan did and what Sarah Palin can do and what other candidates would pay any amount of money for.
